title: Son´s stay at Tottenham driven by trophy desperation
description: Son Heung-min says his desire to stay at Tottenham has been driven by an ambition to achieve a feat others could not, as he targets Europa League glory. Ange Postecoglou’s side face Manchester United in the Europa League final on May 21, with the winner securing Champions League qualification for next season. title: Wilder toasts Sheff Utd achievements after reaching Championship play-off final
description: Chris Wilder says he would not begrudge his Sheffield United players a celebratory drink as he urged his side to enjoy reaching the Championship play-off final. United are one win away from an immediate return to the Premier League after thrashing Bristol City 6-0 across two legs of the play-off semi-finals.
